ai-iti76:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti76:2.1_0: “Mendicants, an astute person who wishes for three kinds of happiness should take care of their ethics.
ai-iti76:2.3_0: “May I be be be praised!” “May I become rich!” “When my body breaks up, after death, may I be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm!”
ai-iti76:2.4_0: An astute person who wishes for these three kinds of happiness should protect their precepts.”
ai-iti76:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti76:3.1_0: “One should guard against three kinds of happiness,
ai-iti76:3.3_0: and to delight in heaven after passing away—
ai-iti76:3.4_0: they depart to rejoice in heaven.
ai-iti76:4.2_0: if you associate with one who does,
ai-iti76:5.1_0: Whatever kind of friend you make,
ai-iti76:5.4_0: for so it is when you share your life.
ai-iti76:6.1_0: The one who associates and the one associated with,
ai-iti76:6.3_0: are like an arrow smeared with poison
ai-iti76:7.2_0: putrid fish in blades of grass
ai-iti76:7.4_0: so it is when associating with fools.
ai-iti76:8.2_0: putrid fish in blades of grass
ai-iti76:8.4_0: so it is when a wise person like this,
ai-iti76:9.5_0: The wicked lead you to hell,
ai-iti76:9.6_0: the good help you to a good place.”
ai-iti76:10.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
